sections.heading: Inventory taken or descriptive list filed when appointment madeWhen the court appoints a provisional administrator, it shall order the taking of an inventory of the property of the succession as provided in Article 3131 or the filing of a descriptive list of the succession property as provided in Ar
sections.text: Inventory taken or descriptive list filed when appointment madeWhen the court appoints a provisional administrator, it shall order the taking of an inventory of the property of the succession as provided in Article 3131 or the filing of a descriptive list of the succession property as provided in Article 3136, unless either has been ordered taken before.Amended by Acts 1972, No. 665, ยง1.
